description: This file contains C source code defining functions for JSON serialization/deserialization of basic data types such as integers, booleans, doubles, strings, and substructures. It provides mechanisms to convert between JSON objects and C types, handling optional and required fields, and supports nested structures.

methods.name: bool pjs_basic_q_from_json(pjs_type_from_json_t * t_from_json,void * t_data,bool * exists,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts an optional JSON value to a C type using a specified callback.

methods.name: bool pjs_basic_from_json(pjs_type_from_json_t * t_from_json,void * t_data,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts a required JSON value to a C type, ensuring existence if not updating.

methods.name: bool pjs_basic_q_to_json(pjs_type_to_json_t * t_to_json,void * t_data,bool exists,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts an optional C type value into JSON.

methods.name: bool pjs_basic_to_json(pjs_type_to_json_t * t_to_json,void * t_data,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Converts a C type value into JSON, assuming it exists.

methods.name: bool pjs_int_q_from_json(int * out,bool * exists,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Parses a JSON integer object into a C int, optional.

methods.description: Parses a required JSON integer object into a C int.

methods.description: Serializes a C int as JSON, optional.

methods.name: bool pjs_int_to_json(int in,json_t * js,const char * name,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Serializes a C int as JSON.

methods.description: Parses a JSON boolean into a C bool, optional.

methods.name: bool pjs_bool_from_json(bool * out,json_t * js,const char * name,bool update,pjs_errmsg_t err)
methods.description: Parses a required JSON boolean into a C bool.

methods.description: Serializes a C bool as JSON, optional.

methods.description: Serializes a C bool as JSON.

methods.description: Parses a JSON real (double) into a C double, optional.

methods.description: Parses a required JSON real into a C double.
